info.title: NX-CGOL
info.author: tbwcjw
info.description: Conway's Game Of Life on the Switch
info.details: An implementation of Conway's Game of Life for the Nintendo Switch. Conway's Game of Life is a cellular automaton where simple rules determine the birth, survival, or death of cells on a grid, creating complex evolving patterns over time.

changelog:
- Added 'stagnant wait'. The simulation will carry on running X number of generations before starting a new colony (if auto_restart is enabled).
- Changed some config keys to be more descriptive.
- Default simulation speed is now 80%, a comfortable middle ground.
-Setting 'auto_restart' to false in the config has no effect.
